labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Discord tells you that you're still using another language (alias a language you manually set) while you're using your system language (here: german) and this can't be undone
data.expected_result: You should still have the language you set manually as your discord language
data.short_description: Discord keeps using the language of your system - even if set to another language
data.steps_to_repro: - Have another system language (I used german) - Have the discord setting set to another language - Restart Canary / Update it
